typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		rec_key as string,
		rec_strategy_partner_ind as string,
		date_inserted as timestamp,
		date_last_updated as timestamp,
		rec_ind_pending as string,
		rec_actual_rec_comments as string,
		rec_actual_rec_date as date,
		rec_actual_rec_ind as string,
		rec_actual_rec_initials as string,
		rec_actual_rec_reminder_date as date,
		rec_litigation_code as string,
		rec_litigation_desc as string,
		rec_obtained_guarantee_ind as string,
		rec_possible_recovery_ind as string,
		rec_reason_for_no_rec_code as string,
		rec_reason_for_no_rec_desc as string,
		rec_possible_rec_comments as string,
		inserted_by as string,
		last_updated_by as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select * from dwh_prepare.pre_dim_recovery',
	format: 'query') ~> PreDimRecovery
